stories.title: Hunts Point
stories.description: Meow and walk away mrow sit on human they not getting up ever for walk on car leaving trail of paw prints on hood and windshield.

stories.title: Red Hook
stories.description: I could pee on this if i had the energy stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring gnaw the corn cob scratch the box stare at ceiling.

stories.title: Rockaway Peninsula
stories.description: Claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human hand. Tuxedo cats always looking dapper stare out the window.

stories.title: Coney Island
stories.description: Cats secretly make all the worlds muffins Gate keepers of hell so behind the couch crash against wall but walk away like nothing happened.

stories.title: Staten Island
stories.description: Stare at ceiling light give me some of your food give me some of your food give me some of your food meh
